data.title: Butterfly Garden GIFT SET with 3-5 LIVE Caterpillars
data.meta_description: Exciting butterfly-themed bonus items and a prepaid voucher for 3-5 Caterpillars make this butterfly-raising kit the perfect gift!
data.text:
"Send Kit with Live / Send Live Insects" is usually the best choice. You’ll save valuable time and you will receive everything you need in one convenient, exciting package. Please select a send out date from the calendar accessed by the blue button.

"Send Kit with Voucher / Send as a Voucher" is a good option only if you are not sure when you, or the recipient, will be ready to receive and raise the insects. Please note this option is not available for all products.

Exciting butterfly-themed bonus items make this butterfly-raising kit the perfect gift!

See An Amazing Transformation

3-5 caterpillars (a live butterfly culture) will arrive in a clear plastic cup with all of the nutritious food they need. Place the cup in a safe place away from direct sunlight. The caterpillars will remain in the cup and will eat, spin silk and grow to TEN times their original size! After seven to ten days they will hang upside down and harden into chrysalides (chrysalides are also known as pupae).

Raise Your Very Own Butterflies

Once the chrysalides have hardened, gently move them to the pop-up butterfly habitat. It will take about seven to ten more days for them to complete the transformation to adult butterflies.

The Butterfly Garden Habitat is a reusable, cylindrical mesh container perfect for up-close butterfly viewing! When not in use it folds flat for easy storage. Then when you wish to raise more butterflies, just order a refill Cup of Caterpillars here.

Butterfly Garden Gift Set With Live Cup of Caterpillars includes:

Cup of 3-5 Caterpillars and nutritious food

30cm butterfly hatching habitat

Full colour instruction booklet with interesting butterfly information

Feeding pipette

Flower-Shaped Butterfly Feeder

3D Butterfly Stickers

Butterfly Wind Up

Bug Tattoos

STEM Butterfly Diary

Insect Lore sugar packet to make your very own butterfly nectar

Chrysalis holding log

'My Butterfly Diary' is a complementary tool designed to enhance your child's learning with a range of fun activities to complete. Beautiful 3D Butterfly Stickers are also included; these 2-layer stickers let you add glittery butterfly fun to almost any crafty project. They're great for decorating notebooks, greeting cards or scrapbooks. The colourful flower-shaped feeder is ideal to quench your newly emerged butterflies thirst, just soak the sponge with nectar.

There's more - see how high your Wind-Up Butterfly can Fly! This rubber band powered flying toy will keep kids busy for hours. It's easy to wind and release.

(Please Note: Butterfly Wind-Up and 3D Butterfly Stickers - colours and styles may vary)

If you choose to upgrade to the DPD delivery option at check out, please be aware that your order will still be dispatched on your chosen send-out date. This service does not include weekend deliveries.

4+

Price: £28.50 incl VAT (£23.75 ex VAT)

Need help with your Caterpillar to Butterfly Process? - Watch these informative videos

Setting up you Chrysalis Station: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Prw99oojY0

Caring for your Chrysalis: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JcwOzy72vcM

Feeding your Butterflies:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wup0WdPnDOc

Releasing your Butterflies: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7_ImYSNCqBs
